member.name: T:RapidWebDev.ExtensionModel.Web.DynamicPage.ExtensionFieldMetadataDetailPanel
member.summary: Extension field metadata detail panel page handler.

member.name: M:RapidWebDev.ExtensionModel.Web.DynamicPage.ExtensionFieldMetadataDetailPanel.Create
member.summary: Create a new field metadata from detail panel and return the field name after created successfully. The method needs to create a new entity and set control values to its properties then persist it.
member.returns: returns the field name after created successfully.

member.name: M:RapidWebDev.ExtensionModel.Web.DynamicPage.ExtensionFieldMetadataDetailPanel.Update(System.String)
member.summary: Update an existed field metadata from detail panel. The method needs to load an existed entity by specified id and set control values to overwrite its original properties then persist it.
member.param: this should be field name instead of id.

member.name: M:RapidWebDev.ExtensionModel.Web.DynamicPage.ExtensionFieldMetadataDetailPanel.Reset
member.summary: Reset all controls of the detail panel to initial state. The method will be invoked when enables the detail panel to support creating entities continuously. After an entity been created, the method will be invoked to reset form controls for another input.

member.name: M:RapidWebDev.ExtensionModel.Web.DynamicPage.ExtensionFieldMetadataDetailPanel.LoadWritableEntity(System.String)
member.summary: The method is designed to load entity by id to editable detail panel controls.

member.name: M:RapidWebDev.ExtensionModel.Web.DynamicPage.ExtensionFieldMetadataDetailPanel.LoadReadOnlyEntity(System.String)
member.summary: Make all editabel controls to be readonly.

member.name: M:RapidWebDev.ExtensionModel.Web.DynamicPage.ExtensionFieldMetadataDetailPanel.OnLoad(RapidWebDev.UI.DynamicPages.IRequestHandler,RapidWebDev.UI.DynamicPages.DetailPanelPageEventArgs)
member.summary: The method will be invoked when detail panel is loaded. The implementation can resolve current visiting Page from the conversation as (HttpContext.Current.Handler as Page).
member.param: The web page which contains the detail panel.
